alert.note: Alert for Delaware Beaches; Inland Sussex (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 16 at 3:04AM EST until January 17 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...East winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Atlantic Coastal Cape May, Coastal Atlantic, Atlantic and Cape May. In Delaware, Delaware Beaches and Inland Sussex. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 3 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
